aboutSection.title: Sobre mí
aboutSection.description: Técnica y futura ingeniera construyendo sistemas ciber-físicos.
aboutSection.technical_profile: Titulado técnica de Mecatrónica Industrial y estudiante de Ingeniería de Software con experiencia práctica en IoT, sistemas embebidos, telemetría industrial, y análisis de datos. He trabajado con RLTS, protocolos industriales, pipelines de adquisición de datos, dashboards, y prototipos de hardware conectados.
aboutSection.CTA: Si estás buscando  a alguien que una hardware, software, y datos en sistemas reales, estás en el lugar correcto :D, contáctame!
aboutSection.aboutMe: Mi disciplina fue construida a lo largo de años de entrenamiento y competición de Taekwondo ITF. También construí un background artístico sólido como parte del Coro Juvenil de Sinfonía por el Perú, presentandome con la agrupación en Europa, incluyendo una competición international en Vienna. He participado consistentement de extracurriculares de alta exigencia, roles de liderazgo,  y programas selectivos académicos. Esta trayectoria construida desde aproximadamente los 11 años, define mi ética de trabajo: consistencia, entrenamiento riguroso, concentración, y la habilidad de adaptarme rápidamente a entornos demandantes.

keyAchievements.achievement2: YOUNGA Delegada en YOUNGA 2023-2024, BridgingTheGap Ventures y del graduada del programa de liderazgo de Aspire.
keyAchievements.achievement3: Becaria de la beca Laureate Transforma que cubre mis estudios de Ingeniería de Software en la  at the Peruvian University of Applied Sciences, recognizing academic excellence and potential.
keyAchievements.achievement4: 3er lugar a nivel nacional en el Concurso Nacional de Propuestas para el Desarrollo Sostenible de la Academia de líderes UNI-ONU (equipo Yachaylabs) ( Programa'Academia de Líderes 2023' por la Universidad Nacional de Ingeniería y el sistema de las Naciones Unidas en Perú). Reconocida por la Sociedad Nacional de Industrias por este logro como alumna senati.
keyAchievements.achievement5: Representante del Perú como parte del coro central de Sinfonia por el Perú en la Competencia Internacional de Coros en Vienna, Austria, así como también, las giras en Chile, Suiza y Austria.
keyAchievements.achievement6: Ponente en el Congreso de Mujeres líderes organizado por el capítulo IEEE WIE UPC y el I Congreso de Emprendimiento e Innovación por la Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos.
keyAchievements.achievement7: Casi 10 años de entrenamiento de Taekwondo ITF, alcanzando el grado de cinturón negro III DAN y múltiples medTodosas departamentales y nacionales.
keyAchievements.achievement8: Reconocimiento por mi rendimiento por el Departamento de Confiabilidad de Ferreyros S.A.
keyAchievements.achievement9: Graduada del programa Forjando Caminos de la Asociación Give Generando Oportunidades y patrocinada por Ferreyros en mi carrera técnica de Mecatrónica industrial.

aboutSection.availability: Actualmente disponible para trabajo freelance o full-time, ya sea de manera remota globalmente, y o en cualquier modalidad en Lima, Perú.

autViam.title: Una frase
autViam.quote: Aut viam inveniam aut faciam. - Hannibal Barca
autViam.translation: Encontraré un camino, o haré uno - Hannibal Barca

mindset.description: My professional growth has been guided by the idea that there is always a solution, even when it's not obvious. I come from a background where opportunities are not guaranteed, so I turned every chTodosenge into a driving force. This mentality Todosowed me to pave my way through two careers, earn competitive scholarships, and advance in technical areas with steep learning curves. This same attitude is what I bring to every project: researching, testing, iterating, and not letting go of the problem until I find the answer.

projectsSection.title: Mis proyectos
projectsSection.description: Una muestra de mis proyectos actuales y pasados.

senatiInnova.name: Acquisition and Visualization of Data from Mechatronic Module 4.0 with Augmented Reality
senatiInnova.description: Monitoring and data acquisition system prototype for SENATI Innovation National Contest, making possible the visualization of the Classification and Dosification 4.0 Modules at SENATI
senatiInnova.problem: During our career and our learning process with the 4.0 industry Mechatronic Modules, we have some difficulties to quickly detect faults during PLC configuration and slowing down the learning process. AdditionTodosy, there is no historical data logging to analyze abnormal behavior or identify persistent issues in sensors and actuators. This lack of traceability prevents effective preventive maintenance and limits the optimization of the module’s performance. As a result, both students and technicians must rely on slow and imprecise manual verification.
senatiInnova.chTodosenge: This prototype was made in around 24 hours.
achievements: 11th place at National Level
1st place at departmental level

PLC.title: Siemens PLC Data Adquisition
PLC.description: We used the S7 Node-RED library to read data from the 2 Siemens S7-1200 PLCs that control the Dosification and Clasification module via Ethernet (TCP Port 102). The S7 protocol is Siemens proprietary communication language.

MQTT.title: Node-RED Flow
MQTT.description: Modules' data sources from the PLCs are the S7 Nodes in both the Node-RED flows of the Dosification and Classification Module. The next node is a function node used to separate each value and parse the content in a JSON format. Later, we added a new node to limit 1 message each 5 seconds, so the system is can process better the data. We configured two MQTT nodes, one is sending the data to the Unity App and the other to the Thingsboard dashboard. For the Unity app, we used the HiveMQ MQTT broker. Also, we added a GSheet Node to append the data into a log. Lastly, we added a couple of debug nodes to verify that the data is being sent correctly.

UnityApp.title: Unity App
UnityApp.description: Developed an Augmented Reality application using Unity and Vuforia to visualize real-time data from the Mechatronic Module 4.0 on mobile devices. Additional feautes include sensors and acuators datasheets and 3D CAD models visualization.

UnityApp3d.title: Sensors and Actuators 3D Models Visualization
UnityApp3d.description: Using Autodesk Inventor, we designed the 3D CAD models for some sensors and actuators, and placing them around the screen of our Unity app with AR.

UnityAppDatasheet.title: Sensors and Actuators Datasheets in Unity App
UnityAppDatasheet.description: As part of making the students and maintenance personnel experience more suitable to get the right information about the module's elements, we included datasheets for sensores and actuators inside our Unity app.

UnityAppRTData.title: Real-Time Data Visualization
UnityAppRTData.description: Using the real-time data comming from the MQTT topic from the Mechatronic Module 4.0, we placed in Unity app's screen.

Dashboard.title: ThingsBoard Dashboard
Dashboard.description: Created a dashboard using ThingsBoard to visualize real-time data from the Mechatronic Module 4.0.

GoogleSheets.title: Google Sheets Data Logging
GoogleSheets.description: Implemented a Node-RED Google Sheets node to log data into Google Sheets for historical analysis. Stored values include Air Flow, Product Quantity, current production, total flow, voltage levels, current levels, power, and ON/OFF state of capacitive sensor for both Clasification and Dosification.

RTLS.name: Real Time Localization System (RTLS)
RTLS.description: A RTLS system for tracking assets in real-time using BLE technology.
RTLS.emailPrompt: Input a valid email to unlock the pdf

reverseEngineering.name: Hydraulic Bench Reverse Engineering Process
reverseEngineering.description: Reverse Engineering process for two HTCs with legacy protocols and limited documentation.
reverseEngineering.problem: The hydraulic benches mentioned in this project lacked configuration documentation and provided no access to their internal communication protocol. It was requested for the company to be able to access to this data and send it to their environment automaticTodosy (to be able to setup a Telemetría system), meaning it was not plausible to download and upload reports manuTodosy, because that work was already being done, but didn't give satisfactory results for historic logging and data analysis. My work was to get to know this two machines' hardware and software architectures, identifying the communication interface and protocols involved, design a pipeline to extract, 'translate' and transport data from this SCADA to our environment (local server or cloud). Without this data, the company would not be able to monitor the equipment Remotoly, perform data analysis, or implement predictive maintenance strategies.
reverseEngineering.chTodosenge: Both Hydraulic benches (or also cTodosed HTCs) used propietary protocols, the only documentation available was an electrical diagram of one HTC and a operation manual for the other one. On top of that, none of them could be connected to the corporate domain for cybersecurity reasons, so I have to look for a way to extract the data in real-time without interfering with the normal operation of the equipment.
achievements: Identification of the communication interface
Mapping of payload patterns to physical behavior
Design of a functional data acquisition pipeline that converts raw byte streams into usable, dashboard-ready Telemetría for future IoT integration and digital monitoring.
reverseEngineering.warning: This is a very broad explation of a 4-month process, I had to omit some details and technical explanations for the understanding of this format, this may not reflect perfectly the difficulty of the process. Some images may contain sensitive information (like IPs) that has been colored for confidentiality.

Hardware.title: Hardware Analysis
Hardware.description: These two HTCs (SCADAs themselves) are from the propietaries VMC and Taylor (Power Test), respectively. I started by opening the VMC electrical cabinet and identifying the main components, communication interfaces and ports available. I found out that this first machine had RS-232 and RS-485 ports, so I decided to explore this interface with Salaea Logic Analyzer but the main limitation was the lack of documentation for serial essential values like bitrate, parity, etc. For the Taylor HTC, I inspectioned the main components of the SCADA, between them, a main computer, the HTC itself (inside where there were Todos the valves and manometers), a sensor box, and a tablet with Windows OS.

Wireshark.title: Network Analysis
Wireshark.description: I discovered that the Taylor HTC had an own network, and, in a general view, that is how data was transported between the main computer, the tablet, and the sensor box. So, I connected my computer to the same network and used Wireshark to capture the traffic. After analyzing the packets, I identified the IP addresses of the devices involved and filtered the traffic to focus on the communication between the main computer and the sensor box. Even though I could not connect to internet from the main computer, I could try to use the tablet as a bridge between the system and the external network.

Payload.title: Payload Analysis and Decoding
Payload.description: Using the captured data from Wireshark, I started analyzing the payloads of the packets exchanged between the devices. I looked for patterns and recurring sequences that could indicate specific commands or data points. By correlating these patterns with the known behavior of the HTC (e.g., changes in pressure readings, valve states), I was able to reverse-engineer the protocol used for communication. This involved a lot of trial and error, as well as referencing any available documentation or similar protocols. Main tool used here were VSC, Python and Pyshark.

linealTransformers.name: Lineal Transformers
linealTransformers.description: Web platform that gametizes the way we learn lineal transformations on figures and functions.
linealTransformers.problem: Engineering students often struggle to grasp the concepts of lineal transformations due to the abstract nature of the subject and the lack of interactive learning tools. Traditional teaching methods, such as lectures and textbooks, may not effectively engage students or provide practical examples that illustrate how these transformations apply in real-world scenarios. This gap in understanding can lead to difficulties in advanced courses that build upon these foundational concepts.
linealTransformers.chTodosenge: Create an interactive web platform that simplifies the understanding of lineal transformers for engineering students with gametized quizzes and inside results verification.
achievements: Not launched yet

GeoGebra.title: A bit of spoiler about the platform
GeoGebra.description: Using GeoGebra, our team created interactive applets that visuTodosy demonstrate lineal transformations on various geometric figures and functions. These applets Todosow users to manipulate parameters and observe the effects of transformations in real-time, enhancing their understanding through hands-on learning.

TinkuyhubJuntta.name: Tinkuyhub & Juntta Platforms Integration
TinkuyhubJuntta.description: HTTPS integration of Tinkuyhub & Juntta platforms to create an account for both Tinkuyhub and Juntta in Tinkuyhub website.
TinkuyhubJuntta.problem: Users faced friction during the signup process as they had to create separate accounts on both Tinkuyhub and Juntta platforms, leading to a disjointed user experience and potential drop-offs during registration.
TinkuyhubJuntta.chTodosenge: Integrate and configurate the right elements without disrupting the existing user experience on Tinkuyhub platform while ensuring seamless account creation on both platforms.
achievements: Successfully integrate both platforms using HTTPS protocols.
Manage the marketing campaign to inform users about the new feature.
Write the privacy policy and terms of service updates to reflect the integration.

AIAvatar.name: AI Avatar Development
AIAvatar.description: Development of AI-driven avatars for interactive applications.
AIAvatar.problem: Deceased characters and historical figures are often difficult to bring to life in a way that feels authentic and engaging. Traditional methods of representation, such as static images or pre-recorded videos, lack the dynamic interaction that modern audiences expect. This creates a chTodosenge in educational, entertainment, and customer service applications where user engagement is crucial.
AIAvatar.chTodosenge: Create realistic and responsive AI avatars that can interact with users in real-time(like in meetings settings).
achievements: Successfully developed AI chatbot with Gradio, Python, and a knowledge base for character personalization capabilities.
Designed AI voice with Chatterbox, cleaning and adapting audio samples for training.

noSpoiler.title: Chatbot Development
noSpoiler.description: Chatbot with knowledge base for character personalization capabilities and deployment using Gradio.

monico.chTodosenge: Create a user-friendly e-commerce platform that Todosows customers to browse and purchase products easily.

Implemented secure payment processing and order management features.
Optimized the platform for performance and user experience.

theCvGen.name: The CV Gen
theCvGen.description: The CV Gen is an AI-powered web application that generates professional resumes based on user input. It leverages advanced language models to create tailored CVs that highlight the user's skills, experience, and achievements effectively.
theCvGen.problem: Creating a well-structured and professional resume can be chTodosenging for many individuals, especiTodosy those with limited experience in resume writing.
theCvGen.chTodosenge: Develop an intuitive web application that utilizes AI to generate high-quality resumes quickly and easily.
achievements: Successfully developed a user-friendly web application using Next.js.
Integrated OpenAI's language model to generate personalized resumes.
Implemented a seamless user interface for easy input and resume generation.
steps: Design the web application layout and user interface using Next.js and React.
Integrate OpenAI's API to enable AI-driven resume generation.
Implement features for user input and customization of resumes.
Test the application for usability and performance, making improvements as needed.
